396430.name: RTK13 - Bonus Officer CG “Liu Bei” 「劉備」特典武将CG
396430.description:
Officer graphics for Liu Bei will be added.
We will use the Peach Garden Oath as a motif.

▼To Use
Select "EDIT OFFICER." Under "EDIT HISTORICAL OFFICERS" choose "EDIT FACIAL GRAPHICS" and select Liu Bei. The available face graphics will appear. Choose the Liu Bei Bonus Officer graphic from the Special edition.
Following this, you will be able to use it in both MAIN and HERO MODES.
396430.supported_languages:
日语*, 繁体中文*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
